mapper.insert: insert into TB_users (user_name, user_nick, user_password, user_addr, user_email, user_phone, user_desc, user_issys) values (#{user_name}, #{user_nick}, #{user_password}, #{user_addr}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_desc}, #{user_issys})
mapper.select:
select a.* from (select t.* from (select user_seq, user_name, user_nick, user_password, user_addr, user_email, user_phone, user_desc, user_x, user_y, user_intidate FROM `TB_users`
user_name user_nick user_phone user_addr like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by user_seq DESC ) t where t.user_seq <=(CEIL(#{page}/10))*100+1) a where a.user_seq between ((#{page}-1)*10)+1 and (#{page}*10)
